sourcesContent:
import * as React from 'react'; import { Button } from '@mui/material' import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import 'highlight.js/styles/monokai-sublime.css'; import hljs from 'highlight'; const Post = ({post}) => { const [data, setData] = useState({}) const {id} = useParams() const [dataType, setDataType] = useState("post") useEffect(() => { fetch("/api/post/"+id) .then(response => response.json()) .then(json => setData(json)) }, [dataType]) return (
Created by: When: {data.date}

Subject:{data.subject}

Description:{data.description}

                            

                            {data.code}
) } export default Post
